page.title: 19TRANSPORT
page.content: Means of transport in our block are virtually nil. There are no trains, few buses and one taxi service. Residents rely almost entirely on private vehicles. There are excellent mooring facilities in the River Tamar by Cargreen. The block is transversed by one B road (Saltash/Callington), and many narrow, high-hedged, metalled country roads. The nearest airport is at Plymouth and operates a fleet of small aircraft to several mainland airfields as well as the Channel Isles and Ireland. The nearest ferryport is also at Plymouth operated by Brittany Ferries to Roscoff, France and Santander, Spain.
